title: Cointelegraph.com News
description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

entries.title: Bitcoin speculators hodl 2.8M BTC in ‘worst performing’ price cycle
entries.description: Bitcoin unrealized losses mount, but unlike previous market cycles, BTC hodlers underwater are keeping a lid on their emotions.

entries.title: UK regulator alerts public to fake solicitor Bitcoin scam
entries.description: Email scams requesting cryptocurrency have been gaining popularity among criminals around the world.

entries.title: Compound Finance site potentially breached — ZachXBT
entries.description: Crypto investigator ZachXBT has warned users to avoid the Compound Finance website, which appears to have been hijacked and may be redirecting visitors to a phishing site.

entries.title: BitMEX expects ‘no further fines’ for ‘old’ AML violation in US
entries.description: BitMEX addresses the DOJ’s BSA charge as a past issue, highlighting their compliance improvements and founders’ prior penalties.

entries.title: OpenAI partners with lab that created the atomic bomb, but for bioscience
entries.description: OpenAI is partnering with Los Alamos National Laboratory, which conducts research in fields including national security, space exploration, renewable energy and medicine.

entries.title: Terraform Labs to sell 4 companies as part of wind-down
entries.description: The bankrupt Terraform Labs is looking to sell four of its companies as it winds down operations to comply with its multi-billion SEC deal.

entries.title: Inferno Drainer fails attempt to launder ETH — ‘not welcome’ in Railgun
entries.description: Notorious wallet-draining group Inferno Drainer tried to pass $530,000 worth of stolen ETH through Railgun but quickly discovered it couldn’t.

entries.title: Marathon site manager ducks Texas noise charges amid resident complaints
entries.description: David Fischer, manager of a Texas site for Marathon Digital, was acquitted on charges alleging the site violated local noise ordinances.

entries.title: Asia, Africa see rise in share of crypto startups this year, says accelerator
entries.description: Researchers compiling the data believe the changes were due to regulatory uncertainties in the US and increased crypto adoption in emerging markets.

entries.title: CFTC chair reiterates BTC and ETH are commodities in testimony
entries.description: The head of the US commodities regulator, Rostin Behnam, has again argued that the agency should be given regulatory oversight of Bitcoin and Ethereum to better protect investors.

entries.title: Bear or bull: Survey reveals 49% are bullish about crypto
entries.description: A recent CoinGecko survey of 2,500 respondents shows that just under half are currently bullish about crypto, and a quarter haven’t worked out whether it’ll make a move at all.

entries.title: Crypto miners stole $723M of electricity in Malaysia since 2018: Report
entries.description: Malaysia’s Deputy Minister of Energy Transition and Water Transformation revealed the number during an event where they disposed of over 2,000 machines seized in an operation.

entries.title: Bitcoin traders ‘under pressure’ after deepest correction since 2022 erases profits
entries.description: Over 83% of short-term Bitcoin traders saw losses after the BTC price recorded its deepest drawdown since 2022.

entries.title: BitMEX pleads guilty to Bank Secrecy Act violation
entries.description: BitMEX co-founders Arthur Hayes, Benjamin Delo, and Samuel Reed pleaded guilty to similar criminal charges in 2022 and received probation.

entries.title: Intuit lays off 10% of staff to focus on AI
entries.description: About 1,800 people were laid off, but the company plans on hiring about the same number of replacements.

entries.title: Ethereum price data points to impending rally above $3.4K
entries.description: Three key Ethereum price metrics suggest ETH is primed for a rally above $3,400.

entries.title: Crypto payment service Payeer hit with record $10M fine in Lithuania
entries.description: Payeer was fined approximately $10 million after it allegedly allowed transfers to sanctioned banks.

entries.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
entries.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

entries.title: US lawmakers meet with crypto advocates in DC roundtable
entries.description: Anita Dunn, a senior adviser to Joe Biden, attended the roundtable in her personal capacity amid reports the US president was considering changing his position on crypto.

entries.title: 3AC wallet buys NFT with 3-year-old offer, zkSync denies insider minting claims: Nifty Newsletter
entries.description: A wallet owned by the bankrupt hedge fund Three Arrows Capital purchased an NFT via a three-year-old offer.

entries.title: Bitcoin price faces major ‘summer of 2021’ style correction despite BTC whale buying
entries.description: Bitcoin whales have become accumulators again, but analysts say BTC is still at risk of another sharp correction.

entries.title: Goldman Sachs to launch 3 new tokenization products this year: Report
entries.description: The products could include an RWA marketplace and will focus on the United States and Europe.

entries.title: Price analysis 7/10: BTC, ETH, BNB, SOL, XRP, DOGE, TON, ADA, AVAX, SHIB
entries.description: Bitcoin’s recovery faces selling near $60,000, indicating that bears remain active at higher price levels.

entries.title: Inside Lugano’s crypto revolution — A documentary
entries.description: Bitcoin journalist Joe Hall tests Lugano, Switzerland, to see if it truly merits the title of the world’s most crypto-friendly town.

entries.title: Animoca Brands reports 72% increase in bookings for Q1 2024 over Q1 2023
entries.description: The bulk of the $90 million reported came from “digital asset advisory.”

entries.title: High-conviction Bitcoin traders targeted in new long BTC ETFs
entries.description: Rex Shares’ new Bitcoin ETFs offer 200% long or short directional exposure to Bitcoin’s price volatility.

entries.title: Coinbase’s Stand With Crypto initiative to launch in Canada
entries.description: The group hinted at advocating for crypto regulation in Canada and updating the country’s financial system, as residents had an “appetite” for change.

entries.title: Jack Dorsey’s Block to supply 3nm mining ASICs to Core Scientific
entries.description: Block has secured its first sale of newly developed mining chips, co-designed with ePIC Blockchain Technologies and Core Scientific’s collaboration.

entries.title: Bitcoin traders’ profit margins repeat 2022 bear market — New research
entries.description: Bitcoin is exhibiting classic bottoming-out territory when viewed through the lens of unrealized losses, CryptoQuant says.

entries.title: Crypto won big in the Supreme Court's Loper Bright decision
entries.description: The Supreme Court ended the Chevron doctrine in June — significantly undermining the Securities and Exchange Commission's ability to stand athwart crypto.
